snippet.title: Java - Long, Float and Double Tutorial
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast

- Here are the exact differences between float long and double (AKA single/double precision floating point) variables in java! ✅

👑Start practicing now with 10 free java programs - http://alexlorenlee.com/
🌅 Source Code -https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Numbers/DoubleLongFloat.java

Java long, int, float and double are all variables for numbers. Each variable has its own range. You can find them here: https://cs.fit.edu/~ryan/java/language/java-data.html

Int and long variables can't have decimals. 
Float and double variables do have decimals.

Java int, long, double and float variables in java can be tricky... Like I said, I didn't understand the difference for most of college, but you'll surely get the hang of it! They aren't too bad :) If you followed along, congrats! You learned-by-doing!

I hope you enjoyed this tutorial on java float vs double vs long! I like to have a nice mix of tutorials and actual projects for you all :)

Do you want to learn how to code from scratch, in Java? Check out my Java Tutorial For Beginners: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

How are you using int, long, float and double data types in java? -

Free tips and programs: http://alexlorenlee.com

TheNewBoston: https://youtube.com/user/thenewboston

~

https://youtube.com/channel/UCLkeDGcXfiKlN2imazwkg4A (2nd channel)

Alex Lee
